Tests that console logging large messages will be truncated.

Evaluating in console: "b".repeat(10000 * 20)
Evaluating in page: console.log("a".repeat(10000 * 2))
Message: 0, length: 22
Message: 1, length: 10010
Message: 2, length: 10008

Expanding hidden texts
Message: 0, length: 22
Message: 1, length: 200002
Message: 2, length: 20000
